articles.author: Michael David Smith
articles.title: Daniel Jones is the Colts’ 11th starting quarterback since Andrew Luck retired - NBC Sports
articles.description: Today's announcement that Daniel Jones is the Colts' starting quarterback gives Indianapolis its 11th starting quarterback since Andrew Luck retired before the 2019 season.
articles.content:
Todays announcement that Daniel Jones is the Colts starting quarterback gives Indianapolis its 11th starting quarterback since Andrew Luck retired before the 2019 season.
